name: Revenge of the Flying Balls
overview: Fun vertical shooter in which you have to defend yourself against multicolored alien balls who are out to take over the world. Inspired by Bombjack LTD and MCG's type in game "Flying Balls". Complete 32 levels by shooting down all of the flying balls. If a ball or ball's bullet hits your ship. A life is lost. Lose all 3 lives and it is game over. Have fun and don't take this one too seriously.
